Attacker Mac OKeefe  attempts to make a shot towards Michigans goalduring Penn State mens lacrosse game against Michigan on Friday April   at Panzer Stadium in University Park Pa.The Nittany Lions beat theWolverines  PERIOD

Just two weeks after becoming the leading goal scorer in Division I mens lacrosse history and just days after becoming a firstround pick in the PLL draft fifthyear attackman Mac OKeefe has reached another milestone PERIOD

For the third time in his career OKeefe has been named to the AllBig Ten first team PERIOD OKeefe is the first Nittany Lion to be honored as a firstteam honoree three times PERIOD

B1GNews 

 Here is your B1GMLax AllBig Ten First Team 

  httpst.coM0voIJ4A2S pic.twitter.com7JumNJnyMG

With  goals on the season OKeefe ranks seventh in goals scored in the conference and eleventh in points with  PERIOD

Joining OKeefe as a  AllBig Ten honoree is attackman counterpart Dylan Foulds who was named as Penn States Big Ten Sportsmanship Award honoree PERIOD This honor comes a week after Foulds gamewinning score against Ohio State this past Saturday PERIOD
